name: Bullet Bros
blurb: Bullet Bros is a modern day "Contra" style shooter with an emphasis on vehicle linking and over the top game-play.

rewards.reward: ----LONE BRO---- A single DRM free digital copy of Bullet Bros + your name listed in our backer credits.
----LONE BRO ELITE---- A single DRM-free digital copy of Bullet Bros + a PDF instruction booklet and a set of concept art wallpapers.
----BRO BRO---- Receive an additional DRM-free digital copy of Bullet Bros to gift to your unhealthiest friend. All previous standard rewards included.
----BETA BRO---- Help me make this game impossible for your parents to play. You will get access to our forums and early access to our Beta Build. All previous standard rewards included.

----ART BRO---- Receive a digital art pdf including high res copies of all the concept art and sketches done for Bullet Bros and a face melting digital soundtrack composed by Fernando Carabajal.  All previous standard rewards included.

----BRO-ARD OF DIRECTORS ---- Join us once a month for a three hour webinar where we discuss the state of the game and brain storm ways to make it better. This would begin once funded and it will not be included in any other reward tiers. Your name will also appear in the Bro-ard of directors list in the credits. All previous standard rewards included.
----BRO BOX---- Receive a retro style physical box copy with printed instruction manual. All previous standard rewards included.
----BROSTER---- Receive a limited edition, signed Bullet Bros poster by Kekai Kotaki. This will not be included in any other reward tiers. All previous standard rewards included.

----BRO BOOK---- Receive a soft cover printed version of the art book. Each book includes an original signed sketch. The art book will feature many guest artists including Kekai Kotaki, Levi Hopkins, Richard Anderson, Thomas Scholes, Horia Dociu Ryan Demita and more. All previous standard rewards included.

----Bro Launch---- Two Invitations to the Bullet Bros launch party in Seattle, Wa. Food and drinks included. Must be over 21 to attend and travel and lodging not included. All previous standard rewards included.

----BRO SCREAM---- Submit a recording of yourself screaming and we will add it as one of the random Bro screams in the game! No profanities, just raw emotion. Your name will appear as a guest voice-over artist in the credits. This will not be included in any other reward tiers. All previous standard rewards included.

---- COME ON BRO---- Submit a recording of yourself yelling "Come on BRO"! and we will add it as one of the random "Come on Bro"s in the game! Your name will appear as a guest voice-actor in the credits.  This will not be included in any other reward tiers All previous standard rewards included.

----BAD BRO---- Help design an enemy and attack pattern for the game. Choose which region it should reside in and help tune its difficulty. Your name will appear in the credits under guest enemy designer.  This will not be included in any other reward tiers. All previous standard rewards included.

----GENERAL BROTORS---- Help the design team come up with a new vehicle to be included within the linking system. Your name will appear as a guest vehicle designer in the credits!  This will not be included in any other reward tiers. All previous standard rewards included.

----BRO BOSS---- Work closely with the design team to create the game-play mechanics for a mini-boss. Your name will appear as a guest boss designer in the credits!  This will not be included in any other reward tiers. All previous standard rewards included.

----BRO-CATION---- Come stay with us in lovely Seattle for a work week. Shadow the devs and help with suggestions and play testing. Travel, food, and lodging included! Receive all other rewards including exclusive ones!!\r\n*Travel limited to within the US.
